title: Shadow Isles is the best faction
body:
It is official: Riot has confirmed that the Shadow Isles are, in fact, the best faction on Runeterra.

The shadowy tendrils of the Black Mist reach far, and not even the monstrous dwellers of the deep are safe from the Isles' somber call. In other words, the Shadow Isles offer you such magnificent creations as:

* **the shark chariot**
https://i.imgur.com/v0YfW64.png[/img]

* **the ghost octopus**
https://i.imgur.com/UWEmqEl.png[/img]

* **Kalista's ex-boyfriend**
https://i.imgur.com/r3nxNUd.png[/img]

* **giant, undead Scuttlecrab**
https://i.imgur.com/3CqpZFs.png[/img]

* **this beautiful specimen**
https://i.imgur.com/3ehGGVV.png[/img]

...and many more!

Next time you wish to pledge yourself to a faction, consider the Shadow Islesâ€”consider how trifling and limited mortal comprehension isâ€”and consider how wonderful the myriad mysteries of the spectral world are compared to those worthless living people and their meaningless struggling against their inevitable mortality.

And also, consider
#the Spider God.
https://i.imgur.com/qXdKWjG.png[/img]
